input.sentences: a young girl is on her way to spend the day with her family exploring a nearby attraction .
she looks on as her younger brother plays with something he found in one of the rooms of the church they were exploring .
they are standing outside of the church | waiting to explore the grounds now .
they walk across a small bridge to explore something they have heard about but never seen .
the giant mushrooms surprise all of the family members | even the adults !
output.sentences: My mummy lets me listen to music while I'm in the car
At home, my brother Jesse plays the piano though he is not very good at it.
Mom is having some repairs done to the roof its starting to leak
There is a blank we have to cross when it rains to get across a small drain
I love every thing about my home there is always some thing to do or see
